sentences: Subsequently, her first singles "Uporedi me"  and "Reci ja" were released under Grand Production the same year.
In addition to music, Todorović portrayed the character of Azra in the Emir Kusturica's opera based his movie Time of the Gypsies, which debuted at the Opéra Bastille, Paris in June 2007.
She also made a cameo performance of the popular Serbian folk song "Jutros mi je ruža procvetala" in the 2017 movie An Ordinary Man, starring Ben Kingsley.
